item.title: Monitoring Kibana with OpenTelemetry Collector: Gathering Logs and Metrics
item.description: Learn how to effectively monitor Kibana using OpenTelemetry Collector in this informative guide. Discover how to gather both logs and metrics data by making specific configurations to Kibana and leveraging the Prometheus exporter. With step-by-step instructions and detailed explanations, you'll gain insights into configuring logs and metrics, setting up receivers, configuring exporters, and creating an OTEL pipeline. Enhance your Kibana monitoring capabilities and optimize your observability with this comprehensive tutorial.
